scripts.start: npm run start:backend && npm run start:frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend "cross-env BACKEND_PORT=$npm_package_config_backend_port npm run dev:backend" "wait-on http://localhost:$npm_package_config_backend_port/healthcheck && cross-env BACKEND_PORT=$npm_package_config_backend_port npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.exec-in-workspace: node -e "const exec = require('child_process').exec; const workspace = process.argv[1]; const command = process.argv[2]; exec('npm run ' + command + ' --workspace ' + workspace, (err, stdout, stderr) => { if (err) { console.error(err); return; } console.log(stdout); console.error(stderr); });"
